paragraph.value: A further two datasets, Berkeley Earth (Rohde et al., 2013) and that of the Japan Meteorological Agency (JMA), are provided in Table 1.1. This working definition provides an updated estimate of
°C for the warming over the period 1880 - 2012 based on a linear trend. This quantity was quoted as
°C in the AR5. Hence the inclusion of the Cowtan-Way dataset (
) does not introduce any inconsistency with the AR5.
